title: Ade and The Giants of the East
description: The inhabitants of Idan have enjoyed three years of peace. Their lands are flourishing and the center of recent developments. Everything works well, until some behemoths from the East, Orins, invade the little village. In conspiracy with the Iyan, the giants take over the farms and the goods of the villagers. They kidnap Ola, Adeâ€™s sister, and take the girl to a high mountain. Somehow, Ade gains a new power and turns them all into sculptures setting his sister free and bringing the village back to its glory.
author: Derek Goneke
